page.title: 16HISTORY OF LYMM'S EDUCATION
page.content: were amalgamated in September 1985. In September 1985, therefore the wheel will have turned full circle, the two schools will be one again.However, it will be different.Lymm Grammar School and Lymm Secondary School both served some of the children in all of the area. Lymm Oughtrington High School and Lymm County High School each served all of the children in some of the area but Lymm High School will serve all of the children in all of the area.The School will be on two sites.Years 1-3 on the former Grammar School site and years 4-7 on the former Secondary School site.
